name: chillframe
description: ChillFrame brings some of the most chill Youtube Music Feeds into one window.

scripts.build: cd build && electron-packager ../src ChilFrame --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --overwrite --app-copyright="Copyright (c) 2019 NOAH HALSTEAD. All rights reserved." --icon ../src/icons8-windchill-48.ico --win32metadata.CompanyName="NOAH HALSTEAD" --win32metadata.ProductName="ChillFrame" --win32metadata.FileDescription="ChillFrame Video Player"
